name: RTwoS
description:
RTwoS! 

Real Time without Strategy, or more intentionally, an rts without being able to control units.

After placing your initial base, use the bottoms at the bottom left of the screen to queue units, or place new buildings. If a player's main base is destroyed they lose! Once your main base is placed, new buildings must be placed within a certain range.  Control the camera with WASD or Arrow keys.

If you wish, you can follow me on twitter, where I post gifs/vids of my random projects. https://www.twitter.com/Andrew_LGN

Afterthoughts:  (You can skip this)

Though lacking a lot of what I wanted to put into the game, I am quite happy with what I have managed to do. I only had roughly 12 hours to create the whole thing, and personally consider creating the rts system, with randomly generated maps, and a very basic AI, overly ambitious for myself. 

With the core programming finished, it is ready for me to throw in new units and buildings at a quick rate and given another couple of hours, I think the selection of them would be at a point where I am happy with it. So, I think I will continue this over the coming weeks and post an updated version with the units. Regardless I am satisfied with what I have done, it is a functional prototype of the idea I had in mind.
